Posted By: jay wolt
Have a couple of Lawson's striker game cards from 1884.
1st known Baseball card game ever produced.
In great shape, almost 125 years old.

Paypal, check or money order

SGC-88 $100 dlvd
GAI-8 $95 dlvd
